author: peterreilly
msg: When a proxied task throws a build exception, or other
exception, the taskadapter reports this at
error level. This is incorrect as the
intent of taskadapter is to transparently adapt
a task, the exception should be reported

author: antoine
msg: fixes NPE on iterator causing JXPath to fail with exception if expression returns no results
Submitted by: Nick Chalko (nick at chalko dot com)

author: umagesh
msg: Ignore the patch file and the temporary file when checking for Copyright.

author: umagesh
msg: Remind submitters to include the ASF copyright on new files.
